changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS history_entity ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, vin VARCHAR NOT NULL, value VARCHAR, field_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, source_type VARCHAR, created_ts TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_history_entity PRIMARY KEY (id) );
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS history_entity_vin_idx ON history_entity(vin)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS history_queue_entity ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, vin VARCHAR NOT NULL, data TEXT, source_type VARCHAR, CONSTRAINT pk_history_queue_entity PRIMARY KEY (id) );
